TopicTitle: Get to and land on minmus using only Small Solid Rocket Boosters and RCS

Articles.Content:
Hi All,

Been hovering around the forums for a while and but first time posting. Thought I would post up a challenge I laid down to a mate and see how other people approach the challenge, which is:

Land 3 kerbals on Minmus using the 3 man Mk1-2 Command Pod, using only the SMALL solid Rocket Boosters and RCS!

The Rules:

Must be stock parts

  • The only engines allowed are RT-10 Solid Fuel Booster (The small one), and RCS
  • MUST use the 3 man Mk1-2 Command Pod
  • NO other engines, No liquid engines, no Ion engines, No nuclear engines, No jet engines, No engines running on Beer cans and Banana Skins (Sorry Mr Fusion!!) Only the small SRB and RCS
  • You must 'Land' on minmus. (Crashing doesnt count)
  • Your ship MUST land and still be able to successfully take off again!
  • You Must plant a Flag
  • Must be stock parts only

I hope people will enjoy having a go at the challenge. Let us know how well you did and how many attempts. Screenshots Welcome.

Remember, Failure is almost certainly an option

While I have recorded my full flight I shall upload it soon enough, for the time being thou here is a little trailer Video of some of my attempts

Enjoy

EvilKyote.

Edited April 1, 2014 by EvilKyote
